name: Test Your Math
summary:
Test your Math is a new free app that will help you master your math skills! Collect brain points to unlock more game modes and get new characters! Use power-ups to get more brain points. This is a perfect game for math lovers and those who want to learn math in a fun way!  
  
Challenge yourself with 8 game modes:  
• Prime or Not  
• Catch the Error  
• Operator challenge  
• Magic Square  
• Modulo  
• Exponents  
• Addition/Subtraction  
• Multiplication  
  
Games features:   
• 8 different game modes  
• 5 fun power-ups  
• 12 unique characters   
• Simple game play  
• Easy to learn  
• Kids zone for young players  
• Each character has its own powers
